lines.text: It concerns honor. Do you know what that is? We're a bunch. We don't mistreat each other, or sell out. We don't steal from each other. We don't throw each other off trains... especially when they're moving. It also concerns right and wrong. The Creeds did me wrong, and I need to set it right.

[when writing his love letter to his wife]
Tell Junior to stay clear of skunks, especially the two-legged kind.
